main_text: Backend and cybersecurity enthusiast focused on building secure, scalable, and high-performance systems. I am passionate about designing resilient architectures, automating infrastructure, and applying defensive security practices to real-world applications.
sub_text: My work sits at the intersection of backend engineering, distributed systems, and security research. I enjoy building APIs, deployment platforms, and automation tools while continuously learning reverse engineering, threat detection, and system internals. I aim to engineer systems that are not only fast and scalable but also observable, reliable, and secure by design.
